name: Ext_R4B_MolecularSequence_coordinateSystem
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MolecularSequence.coordinateSystem for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MolecularSequence.coordinateSystem from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MolecularSequence|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Base number of coordinate system (0 for 0-based numbering or coordinates, inclusive start, exclusive end, 1 for 1-based numbering, inclusive start, inclusive end)
element.definition: Whether the sequence is numbered starting at 0 (0-based numbering or coordinates, inclusive start, exclusive end) or starting at 1 (1-based numbering, inclusive start and inclusive end).
element.comment: `MolecularSequence.coordinateSystem` has no related element in R5:MolecularSequence

element.short: Base number of coordinate system (0 for 0-based numbering or coordinates, inclusive start, exclusive end, 1 for 1-based numbering, inclusive start, inclusive end)
element.definition: Whether the sequence is numbered starting at 0 (0-based numbering or coordinates, inclusive start, exclusive end) or starting at 1 (1-based numbering, inclusive start and inclusive end).
element.comment: `MolecularSequence.coordinateSystem` has no related element in R5:MolecularSequence
